17406.「ややっ！ 巨人族の戦士 <pc>様！\n これは よい時に 参られましたな。:
Yah! The Giant Warrior <pc>! You have
come at a good time.

17407.「ちょうど 賢人トール様の\n 占術の結果が 出ようとしているのです。\n ささ:
Sage Thor's divination results are just about
to come in. This way, please...

17408.「大地の精霊たちが 呼びかけに 応えてくれた。\n この かがやきが 残りの三賢:
The spirits of the earth have answered the
call. This Kagayagi will tell us the
whereabouts of the remaining three Wise Men.

17409.「ふむ……。この世界の どこかに\n 巨人族が治める 桃色の城があるらしい。\n:
Hmm... somewhere in this world, there's a peach-colored castle ruled by a tribe of giants. It's a magnificent and beautiful
castle...

17410.「その城下にある 身寄りなき子が集う家に\n 英知の星が ふたつ見える……。\n:
In the house where the children without relatives gather under the castle, I see two stars of wisdom where the two wise men must
sleep.

17411.「なんと！ ふたりの賢人は\n 同じ場所にいるというのですか！\n これは 探す:
What a surprise! Two wise men in the same
place! That saves me the trouble of looking
for them!

17412.「しかし 身寄りなき子が集う家とは……？:
But what is a house where children with no
relatives gather?

17413.「<pc>なら 思い当たる場所が\n あるのではないか？ ボクも 同行するから\:
I'm sure <pc> can think of a place
where he might be. I'll go with you, so please
join me in the search for the Wise Man.

17414.「ありがとう！ キミには いつも感謝している。\n それでは すぐに 出発すると:
Thank you! I'm always grateful to you. Well,
we'll be on our way soon!

17415.「シグルド様。\n また あなたが 行かれるのですか？: Sigurd. Are you going to go again?

17416.「あなたは 指導者という立場を お忘れでは？\n 天命の戦乙女を思うあまり\n:
I think you have forgotten your position as a
leader. It seems that you have lost your cool
with the thought of Fate's War Maiden.

17417.「冷静さを 失っているのではない。\n ボクはただ あの方を救うことこそが\n:
I'm not losing my cool. I just know that
saving her is my mission.

17419.「むっ！？ 待て <pc>！\n どうやら キミは 他にも\n 多数の使命を 抱:
Mwah! Wait <pc>! It appears you have
a multitude of other missions.

17420.「……ならば 仕方があるまい。\n キミは その使命を まっとうしてくれ。\n:
Well... then, I'll leave you to it. You will
complete your mission. And when you're done,
we'll leave.

17421.「そうか……。以前 キミに話したとおり\n ボクたちは 巨人族の視線を あびると:
Well... as I told you before, when we are
exposed to the gaze of the Titans, our bodies
become immobile.

17422.「キミのチカラが 借りられないとなると\n 何か 他の手立てを 考えるしかないな:
If we can't get you to help us, we'll have to
find something else to do.

17423.「<pc>か！\n よくぞ ふたたび 訪ねてくれた！:
<pc>! You've done us a great favor by
visiting us again!

17424.「<pc>。大地の精霊たちの声が\n 我らに 残りの三賢人の居場所を伝えてくれた:
<pc>. The voices of the spirits of
the earth have told us the whereabouts of the
remaining three wise men.

17425.「この世界の どこかに\n 巨人族が治める 桃色の城があるらしい。\n とても雄:
Somewhere in this world, there is a peach-
colored castle ruled by a tribe of giants.
It's a magnificent, beautiful castle...

17426.「その城下にある 身寄りなき子が集う家に\n 英知の星が ふたつ見えた……。\n:
In the house where the children without relatives gather under the castle, I saw two stars of wisdom... two wise men must be
sleeping there.

17427.「<pc>。賢人が眠る場所に\n 心当たりは ないか？ ボクも 同行する。\n:
<pc>. Do you have any idea where the
wise men sleep? I'll go with you. I want you
to search for the Wise Man with me.

17428.「わお！ それがウワサの ベリーダンスね。\n あんたって あたしの神様！？\n:
Wow! That's the belly dancing I've heard so
much about. Are you my god? If that's the
case, I think I might frighten you too!

17429.「これで ダンスパーティも バッチリね！\n あとは ププリさえ…………。:
Now we're ready for the dance party! Now all
we need is Pupuri...

17430.「……ううん なんでもない。\n あいつのことなんて どーでもいいんだった。: It's nothing. I didn't care about that guy.

17431.「わあっ それが さそうおどり？\n あ ありがと…… それなら\n あたしにも:
Wow, is that the Saso Odori? Oh, thanks...
then I wonder if I can frighten you too...

17432.「あ……！ ち ちがうよ……？\n ダンスパーティに 行きたいんじゃないの。\n:
Ah...! No, no...? I don't want to go to the
dance party. My only friends are my dolls.

17433.「ただ…… おどったら どんな気持ちになるか\n ちょっとだけ…… 知りたかった:
I just... wanted to know how it felt to
frighten you... just for a second.

17434.「あっ！ ヤッバい！！\n もう ダンスパーティの時間じゃん！\n それじゃあね:
Oh, shit! Oh, no! It's time for the dance
party! See you later, traveler!

17435.「そ…… そっか……\n もう そんな時間…………。: I see... it's that time already...

17436.「ちょっとくらい…………\n ちょっとくらいなら のぞいたって……\n い…いい: It's okay to peek just a little bit, right?

17437.<center>その日 メギストリスの都の 教会前広場では\nとびきりの ダンス:
That day, in the square in front of the Church
in the City of Megistris, there was a dance
party of the highest caliber.

17438.<center>大人も子供も 楽しい音楽に合わせて\n時を忘れて おどり続け\n:
Adults and children alike danced to the joyful
music, lost track of time, and the night faded
away...

17439.「た…ただいま 旅人さん……。\n えへ。あたしも…… おどってきちゃった。\n:
I'm back, traveler... hehe. I... frightened
myself too. I've never had so much fun
before...

17440.「だったら ウジウジするの やめようよ。\n あのね。あたし ほんとは ずっと\:
Then, let's stop being so gloomy. You know
what? I really wanted to get close to Pupuri.

17441.「今日 いっしょに おどれて うれしかったよ！\n あたしたち これからは 友達:
I'm so glad I got to see you guys together
today! We're going to be friends from now on,
right?

17443.<if_woman>「おねえちゃん……。こ…この お人形 あげる。\n ほんとの:
Onee-chan... this doll is for you. I have a real friend... now, so I... don't need it anymore... Oney-chan... this doll is
for you. I give you this doll. Now that I have a real friend... I think I don't need it anymore...

17444.<if_woman>「じゃあ あたしも ププリと\n なかよくできたから このお:
So, since I got along well with Pupuri, I don't need this doll either! I'll give it to my traveling girl for you.
So, since I got along well with Pupuri, I don't want this doll either! I'll give it to my traveling mommy for you.

17445.<pc>は\n愛の賢人フレイヤ（だいじなもの）と\n光の賢人バルドル（だいじなも:
<pc> received
Sage Freya of Love (Key Item) and
Sage Baldr of Light (Key Item)!<me 60>

17446.かばんの中から シグルドの声が聞こえる。: I hear Sigurd's voice from inside his bag.

17447.「巨人族の戦士 <pc>よ！\n ついに 愛の賢人フレイヤと\n 光の賢人バルド:
O warrior of the giants <pc>! At last
you have found Freya, Sage of Love, and Sage
Baldr, Sage of Light!

17448.「彼らにも 目醒めの術を かけなくては。\n 急ぎ ヴァルハラの館へ 戻ろう！:
They need to be awakened as well. To Valhalla
Hall, quickly!

17450.「おおっ おかえりなさいませ！\n シグルド様！ <pc>様！\n もしや……つ:
Oh, welcome back! Master
Sigurd! <pc>! What if... the Three
Wise Men have come to us at last?

17451.「……承知！ すぐに 皆を集めましょう！！: Yes, sir! Now let's get everyone together!

17452.「三賢人よ！ その瞳に 光を！: Three wise men! Let the light into your eyes!

17453.「愛の賢人フレイヤ 光の賢人バルドルよ！\n 我が名は シグルド。こうして\n:
Freya, Sage of Love, Baldr, Sage of Light! My
name is Sigurd. I am happy to see you here.

17454.「……聞いてくれ 我が同胞たちよ。\n 今 調停者オーディンによって\n 世界の:
Listen, my brothers and sisters. The balance
of the world is now being upset by Odin the
Mediator.

17455.「そなたらも 戦士シグルドにチカラを預け\n ともに 戦ってはくれぬか？:
Will you not entrust your strength to the
warrior Sigurd and fight with him?

17456.「愚問ですわ 賢人トール。\n 答えは ひとつに決まっています。\n 我らの命:
It is a foolish question, Sage Thor. There is
only one answer. Our lives are in the hands of
Sigurd the Warrior.

17457.「異論はない。すべては 世界の均衡のために！:
I have no objection. All for the balance of
the world!

17458.「礼を言う！ そなたら 三賢人には\n いずこかへ連れ去られた 天命の戦乙女の\:
Thank you! I ask that you three wise men
locate the Fate's War Maiden who has been
taken away from you!

17459.「もはや 一刻の猶予も 許されんのだ！\n 急いでくれ！: There is not a moment to lose! Hurry up!

17460.「承知した。我ら 三賢人が そろった今なら\n 天命の戦乙女も 見つけだせましょ:
I will. Now that we, the Three Wise Men, are
all here, we can find the Fate's War Maiden. I
will surely find her with our divination.

17461.「<pc>。キミには 本当に感謝している。\n 三賢人が 一堂に会することが で:
<pc>. I really appreciate you. It is
thanks to your work that the three wise men
were able to meet together.

17462.「この品は 戦士たちに用意させた。\n どれほど役に立つかは わからないが\n:
I have prepared this item for the warriors. I
don't know how useful it will be, but I hope
you will use it in future battles.

17463.「今は 三賢人にまかせ\n しばらく 休息を取っていてくれ！\n 何か 進展があ:
For now, leave the Three Wise Men to rest for
a while! I'll let you know if there are any
developments!

17465.「<pc>。キミには 本当に感謝している。\n 三賢人が 一堂に会することが で:
<pc>. I really appreciate you. It is
thanks to your work that the three wise men
were able to meet together.

17466.「今 三賢人たちが 占術をもって\n 天命の戦乙女の 居場所を探している。:
Now the Three Wise Men are using their
divination skills to locate the Fate's War
Maiden.

17467.「今は 彼らにまかせ\n しばらく 休息を取っていてくれ！\n 何か 進展があれ:
Leave them to it for now and rest for a while!
I'll let you know if there are any
developments.

17810.「巨人族の戦士 <pc>よ！\n キミの かばんに 入らせてもらうぞ！:
Titan Warrior <pc>! I'm going to get
into your bag!

37586.なんと！ <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は\nおどりの極意を 落としていった！:
Oh my! Goodybag dropped the Secrets of Dance!
<pc> read the Secrets of Dance.

37587.おどりとは すなわち愛。\n見る者に 情熱を伝え\n心をつなぎあう 愛の告白であ:
Dance is love. It is a confession of love that
conveys passion to those who see it and
connects hearts.　　　　Great Teacher
